definitions.definition: A dry creek or streambed , a gulch which temporarily or seasonally fills and flows (after sufficient rain).
Any watercourse ; any rivulet ( whether it flows year-round or only seasonally ) .

main_definition: A dry creek or streambed , a gulch which temporarily or seasonally fills and flows (after sufficient rain).
secondary_definitions: Any watercourse ; any rivulet ( whether it flows year-round or only seasonally ) .
